<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Symbolize and annotate disassembled instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For now this mimics the old symbolization logic (from both ARM and x86), that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// relied on user-provided (C API) callbacks to do the actual symbol lookup in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the object file. This was moved to MCExternalSymbolizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A better API would not rely on actually calling the two methods here from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inside each disassembler, but would use the instr info to determine what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operands are actually symbolizable, and in what way. I don&#39;t think this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// information exists right now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#a00aa95cc168a100bdcaed4030479a064">MCSymbolizer</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Try to add a symbolic operand instead of \\p Value to the MCInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instead of having a difficult to read immediate, a symbolic operand would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// represent this immediate in a more understandable way, for instance as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbol or an offset from a symbol. Relocations can also be used to enrich</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the symbolic expression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Inst      - The MCInst where to insert the symbolic operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param cStream   - Stream to print comments and annotations on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Value     - Operand value, pc-adjusted by the caller if necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Address   - Load address of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsBranch  - Is the instruction a branch?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Offset    - Byte offset of the operand inside the inst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param OpSize    - Size of the operand in bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param InstSize  - Size of the instruction in bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return Whether a symbolic operand was added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#adac4188cce487f7706a299575df4f684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#adac4188cce487f7706a299575df4f684">tryAddingSymbolicOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;cStream,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsBranch, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        uint64&#95;t OpSize, uint64&#95;t InstSize) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Try to add a comment on the PC-relative load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For instance, in Mach-O, this is used to add annotations to instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that use C string literals, as found in &#95;&#95;cstring.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#aa88d2b02364ed21ffd55212185593c30"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#aa88d2b02364ed21ffd55212185593c30">tryAddingPcLoadReferenceComment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;cStream,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the MCSymbolizer&#39;s list of addresses that were referenced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbolizable operands but not resolved to a symbol. The caller (some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// code that is disassembling a section or other chunk of code) would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// typically create a synthetic label at each address and add them to its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// list of symbols in the section, before creating a new MCSymbolizer with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the enhanced symbol list and retrying disassembling the section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The returned array is unordered and may have duplicates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The returned ArrayRef stops being valid on any call to or destruction of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the MCSymbolizer object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#aff22a92530c025154e8c3aa07d887b2c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolizer/#aff22a92530c025154e8c3aa07d887b2c">getReferencedAddresses</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
